programme.title: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: It’s estimated that roughly 10,000 people are wrongfully convicted in the U.S. each and every year for crimes they didn’t commit. These wrongful convictions mean that the real perpetrators may still be out there and that we all lose when the criminal justice system we rely on becomes corrupt.

programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Paseka: The Easter Elephant
programme.desc: On Easter morning, a baby elephant is mysteriously abandoned by her herd in the wilds of Botswana’s Okavango Delta. Saved from certain death by a bizarre chain of events, she forces herself into a very unusual, captive elephant herd. This is “Paseka's” story.

programme.title: Life On Us: A Microscopic Safari
programme.desc: Just like planet Earth, our body is composed of diverse landscapes surprising wildlife. This award-winning film offers a unique microscopic safari, encountering the creatures that live, compete, feed, on breed on the surface or in the depths of our body. Some may seem harmful, others are useful and even essential to our survival, but all participate in the biological balance of the human body.

programme.title: Monwabisi
programme.desc: Monwa’s life is tied to the sea. However, his relationship to the marine environment is based in fear. David and the crew aim to help him overcome this fear by getting him into the water. Monwa learns to free dive, and once the crew is satisfied that he can handle more, Monwa takes the plunge and swims with blue sharks in an underwater canyon off the coast of the Cape of Good Hope.

programme.title: Africa's Primeval Oceans
programme.desc: The scene is the southern tip of Africa. Just off shore, two very different seas meet to form one of the most diverse marine environments on earth. The meeting of icy Atlantic and warm Indian waters not only affect life underwater, they are giant forces that shape the land, climate, and all its creatures. The Portuguese explorer Bartholomew Dias and his crew called it the Cape of Storms.

programme.title: Saving Sharks, Raising Awareness
programme.desc: Every hour 10,000 sharks are fished worldwide. Yet, this mythical predator plays a key role in regulating marine life. So now, Jérôme Delafosse has launched The Shark Project - a plea to reconcile humankind with the scary shark - and is traveling the globe to raise awareness about these marvelous animals. Can Jérôme save our sharks from possible extinction?

programme.title: Submarines: The Invisible Weapon
programme.desc: You can’t see them. You can’t hear them. And you never know exactly where they are. The life of submarines is secret and fascinating. In this film, we go inside one of the French navy's legendary vessels, the Rubis, and to where the next nuclear submarine, the Barracuda, is being built. From technological prowess to human exploits, the film submerges us in a timeless amphibian adventure.

programme.title: Peregrine Falcon: Lord of the Skies
programme.desc: While hunting, it can reach speeds of over 90 miles per hour but during its aerial displays it holds the all-time speed record of 242 miles per hour. So it’s not surprising that this powerful bird has conquered the planet and can be found on the five continents. Worshipped, sculpted or trained for prestigious hunts, the power and beauty of this bird has always fascinated mankind.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen

programme.title: Josh Fonokalafi - The Specific Islander
programme.desc: Joshua T Fonokalafi is a Utah based comedian from the mean streets of Ogden, Utahs own Compton. Raised in the Northwest and the son of an Islander immigrant, Joshua tells of his hardships growing up as one of the biggest minorities in the country. Joshua was most recently featured at the Idaho Laugh Fest and is preparing to film his very own comedy special with VidAngel. He's acted in Jackie and Ryan with Katherine Heigl, and in Certain Woman with Laura Dern and Kristen Stewart. Joshua's quick wit and humor will give you an amazing abdominal workout.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Moody McCarthy - The Good Jew
programme.desc: Moody was born “Matthew” in Syracuse, NY, into a rambunctious household with six siblings. (They're Irish...somebody had to get a nickname.) He began doing comedy in 1992 and was soon hired by Syracuse’s top morning radio show to cover sports and write jokes, his first loves. After six years of working the road, Moody moved to New York City. This millennium has been good to Moody: he’s also been featured on Last Comic Standing, Star Search (the 2003 reboot), and America’s Got Talent. He’s a regular at the best clubs in the land (including the world famous Comedy Cellar) and can be heard on SiriusXM. Moody’s material is described as original but universal, and smart without being trite. Couple that with a disarming stage presence & in-the-moment chops, you’ll see why he’s earned the admiration of his peers for his ability to “go up cold” and turn any setting into a hot room. From corporate outings to pubs, this versatile performer will brighten any event.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea
programme.desc: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working

programme.title: Jeff Allen - I Can Laugh About it Now
programme.desc: Jeff Allen combines clean, hilarious humor like no other comedian working today. Besides performing at corporate functions and fundraisers, he regularly appears on television, radio, and casinos across the country. Consistently making heroes out of meeting planners, Jeff Allen provides world-class comedy.

programme.title: David Crowe - White Bread
programme.desc: David Crowe is a 20 year veteran of the comedy stage. After winning both the Seattle and San Francisco Comedy Competitions, then performing for a US President the same year, his career took off and has never stopped. On stage Crowe is armed with a "gallery of facial expressions", a host of accents and a "nerdy charisma that is utterly captivating." He has been featured on Showtime with his own One Hour Comedy Special "Crooked Finger," along with numerous appearances on Comedy Central, Bob&Tom Radio, SiriusXM and Pandora. Overseas, he crushed the competition at the Edinburgh International Fringe Festival garnering three perfect 5-Star reviews from their rather sticky and jaded press (you can read them here in the Testimonials section). David is a guaranteed hit on the corporate entertainment circuit. He has performed at literally hundreds of corporate and private events across the United States and Canada. (See "Past Client" list under Testimonials). He recently concluded a nationwide comedy tour for Investors Group, a financial services company, where he performed for over 60,000 of their most valued clients in 60 different cities. To date, David has released five comedy albums. He believes the best way to stay sharp and relevant is to continue to hone and perfect new material at comedy clubs across the country with the goal of releasing an new comedy special every few years.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Paul Morrissey - A Real Humdinger
programme.desc: Paul was raised as a sports fanatic in the tiny town of Owego, in upstate New York. After four years of playing college basketball, somehow he graduated. Aside from playing in the NBA, his dream job was to talk about sports for a living. Paul then moved to California after landing a television sports anchor job but found out quickly that he was “too much of a smart-ass” for TV news. After he was fired, Paul took his unique sense of humor to comedy club stages all over the country. In 2005, Paul was selected to perform at the HBO Comedy Festival in Las Vegas. Morrissey has also been a finalist in several national comedy competitions including Wendy’s Comedy Challenge, Comedy Central’s Open Mic Fight and Maxim’s Real Men of Comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:DC Benny - You Don't Look Funny
programme.desc: Benny lives in Brooklyn where he fiddles around with old Land Rovers when he is supposed to be helping his wife run her natural skincare business. He has a dog named Grits and two cats who prefer that he not share their personal information in this bio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Danny Villalpando - Too Informative
programme.desc: Danny has been performing stand up comedy for over sixteen years. He’s had the opportunity to work for many corporate events, charity organizations, and cruise ships. He has also had the privilege of working worldwide with the USO and Comic’s on Duty. His comedy has taken him such places as Japan, Singapore, Afghanistan, Panama, Honduras, Greenland, Iraq, Italy, and Greece.... just to name a few! In addition to headlining comedy clubs across the United States, Danny has also performed on television seventeen times. He’s been seen on NBC’s “Friday Night” as well as “The Latino Laugh Festival” and Comedy Central. Danny’s acting talents were also displayed as a bartender, on NBC’s “Meet My Folk’s.” Most recently he completed an independent film with Second City called "Time Share." Most of Danny’s comedy is based on his life experiences. Comedy fans described his act as the type of act you could do anywhere. From a bar, to corporate, it’s just funny!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Corey Rodrigues - People Whisperer
programme.desc: Corey is a highly sought after national touring college, club and corporate and cruise ship performer. He was the winner of The Catch a New Rising Star, The Funniest Comic in New England and the 2017 Big Sky Comedy Festivals. Rodrigues has been featured on the hilarious Gotham Live, Laughs on Fox and True Tv's Laff Mobbs Laff Tracks television shows and currently can be heard on Sirius XM. He combines comedy from his own life and the lives of those around him. Mix that with a hilarious point of view and he's able to talk about just about anything.

programme.title: Key Lewis - Half Black, Half White, Looks Mexican
programme.desc: Sacramento California born Key Lewis is a high energy, improvisational, storytelling, multiple-personality nutcase! His love for the people and hunger for the stage is his undying motivation. His comedic stories about his interracial childhood, family, and unusual views on relationships, make Key simply a joy to watch. His ability to improvise and interact with all types of crowds makes this up and coming comic and actor one to look out for. Key Lewis has appeared on Marlon Wayans TBSís Funniest Wins, Starz Networks StaannDup, Kevin Harts One Mic Stand as well as Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes! Key says, chase your dream, always know your audience donít act funny, be funny... donít worry about the quantity of your material but the quality the sooner you create a relationship with your crowd, the better you will be. Television: Bill Bellamyís Whoís Got Jokes on TVONE. BETíS One Mic Stand Hosted by Kevin Hart. Starz Network Comedy Series called StaannDup, Marlon Wayanís TBSís Funniest Wins! Competitions: Winner of the 2013 Rocky Mountain Laugh Off, Finalist in the 2010 Bay Area Black Comedy Competition, Semi-Finalist 2009 San Francisco International Comedy Competition, a Semi-Finalist in the 2008 Boston Comedy Festival, 2007 Seattle International Comedy Competition Finalist, Shades of Laughs Portland Oregon Winner, TVONE Bill Bellamyís Who Got Jokeís Contestant. Radio: Improv work with FM Morning Shows (Top 40 Radio): KSFM 102.5 (Sacramento, CA), KWOD 106.5 (Sacramento, CA) KWIN 97.7 ñ Stockton/Lodi, CA, Mix 107.9 Salt Lake City UT (Is It Racist Segment) & The Man Panel. Concerts/Festivals: Opened for Jon B. and Keysha Cole, Taste Of Tacoma, & Bite Of Seattle Fountain Stage 5 Years Running! Key Lewis has worked with the likes of Kevin Hart, Pablo Francisco, Sam Bam, Alonzo Bodden, Jay London, Gabriel Iglesias, Brooks McBeth, Tommy Davidson, Katt Williams, De-Ray Davis, Andrew Norelli, Lonnie Love, Jeff Garcia, Damon Wayans, Joey Diaz, Guy Torry, Darren Carter, Paul Mooney, Kermet Apio and many more.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dennis Regan - Dennisland
programme.desc: The King Of Queens writer Dennis Regan comes swinging hard with his quick wit and flawless delivery. The laughs just keep on coming in "Dennisland".

programme.desc: Jeff kayaks around the Inian Islands on an epic adventure among the stellar marine wildlife before his ship arrives to Icy Strait Point. programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff’s ship brings him to Alesund, Norway, where he sails a Viking vessel and explores the historic culture. Then, a renowned chef delights Jeff with an epic gourmet experience as they forage for delicacies along the pristine shores. Finally, Jeff caps the day in Norway’s most famous fjord by climbing to see the ultimate Nordic vista.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff travels to Berlin, Germany, for the adventure of a lifetime. He visits Frederick the Great’s elaborate summer palace and learns the secrets of historical sculpture restoration. Then, Jeff gets a taste of classic German fare like pretzels. Finally, he explores the Berlin Wall with a former East German escapee.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff explores St. Petersburg, Russia, and discovers a glorious city with a majestic royal palace that’s steeped in history. Then, his adventure soars to new heights as he practices an ancient pastime of the czars. Finally, a local chef gives Jeff a delightful taste of Russian culture with some classic local delicacies.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff’s ship arrives to historic Split, on the beautiful coast of Croatia, where he explores an ancient Roman palace. Then, he slides, splashes, and sloshes through an awesome river canyon. Finally, Jeff discovers the buzz behind a local honey that’s been savored for thousands of years.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff cruises to the Mediterranean island of Sardinia where he discovers an ancient twist on Italian cuisine. Then, he joins conservationists to help save Europe’s 2nd largest bird species from extinction. Finally, Jeff gets a glimpse of Sardinia’s ancient past at an archaeological dig to help uncover the island’s multicultural history.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: (Best of- Catalina, Alesund, Seward, Bermuda) Jeff embarks on an international adventure in search of epic explorations. First, he sails an 18th century style vessel off the California coast. Then, he rappels into a massive glacier in Alaska. Next, Jeff discovers historical shipwrecks in Bermuda before capping his adventure by exploring the famous fjords of Norway.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: KUSHIRO Jeff arrives in Kushiro, Japan, and learns the secrets to making traditional ramen, a delicious noodle soup. Then, he explores a popular lake in search of giant algae balls and discovers their importance to Japanese culture. Finally, Jeff is immersed in the ancient customs of the native Ainu people.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff comes ashore in beautiful Marseille, France, and saddles up with the guardians of a cherished breed of rare white horses. Next, an acclaimed chocolatier helps Jeff discover the French connection to chocolate. Then, Jeff explores the historic castle made famous in the literary classic The Count of Monte Cristo.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff arrives in the bustling South Korean sea port of Busan where he experiences a spirited display of Korean culture in a colorful mask dance. Next, he explores the city’s famous market and discovers the key element to great Korean cuisine. Then, Jeff helps flight test some native birds of prey at a local wildlife center.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff and his daughter arrive to Freeport, Bahamas, and discover an amazing local effort to save the endangered Queen Conch. Next, they take their adventure below water to snorkel with sea turtles and dive through a sacred crystal cavern. Finally, the Corwins experience the thrill of deep sea fishing with the payoff of a true Bahamian beach cookout.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff travels to Kyoto, Japan, and discovers a culturally rich city with a historical connection to Japan’s legendary swordsmen, the samurai. Then, he learns the 500-year-old fine art of Awaji puppetry. Finally, Jeff and a master confectioner handcraft ancient treats that were once reserved for the Japanese emperor.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Best of 2 Jeff travels the globe to experience a kaleidoscope of world cuisine. In Berlin, he discovers a comforting local favorite, the German pretzel. Then, Jeff enjoys a sumptuous bowl of ramen in Japan. In St. Petersburg, Russia, a local chef delights Jeff’s senses with homemade dumplings and borscht. Finally, he enjoys a freshly caught meal in the great outdoors of Alaska.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin

Finally, Jeff enjoys a classic Alaskan fishing experience and prepares the delicious catch at beach cookout.

programme.title: Ocean Treks with Jeff Corwin
